text: Excellent service. Easy to purchase items and pay on the spot. Cashier also asked if I was a yuu member.

Pharmacist Joanne was really helpful. She proactively approached me as I was confused which lozenges to buy. She also offered me 3 different options of medications with explanations on the pros and cons for each. I also appreciate that she was very detailed and clear about the instructions for each medication as well üëç

There is supposed to be a pharmacist on duty but seems to be missing in action on several occasions I went there.

There are two Guardians in Serangoon Gardens, one opposite ChompChomp and the other at My Village. Both are good with the usual deals, varieties and everyday necessities. This is the one at MyVillage. Convenient since its next to the NTUC.
